title: My Heartlet: BP & Cholesterol
description:
Take care of your heart health with My Heartlet. This app helps you track and manage your cholesterol, blood pressure and weight easily. Whether you're looking to improve your diet or stay on top of your health numbers, My Heartlet has the tools you need.

WHY MY HEARTLET?

* Quick Cholesterol, Fat and Protein Info: Find out the cholesterol, fat and protein content in various foods. This helps you stick to a heart-healthy diet.
* Monitor Your Blood Pressure and Weight: Keep an eye on your blood pressure and weight changes with clear charts and stats.
* Nutrition Calculator: Calculate the cholesterol, fat, and protein in your meals. This makes it easier to watch what you eat.
* Read Up on Heart Health: Get useful info about how cholesterol affects your health and how to eat better.

KEY FEATURES

* Easy to Start: Open the app and use it right away—no need to sign up or log in.
* Prevent Disease: Use our tips to avoid diseases linked to high cholesterol and poor eating habits.
* Support Your Diet: Our food lists help you choose foods that are good for your heart.

UNDERSTANDING CHOLESTEROL
Cholesterol isn't all bad, but too much can lead to heart disease and stroke, major causes of death around the world. Learn how to manage your levels and keep your heart in good shape.

TIPS FOR A HEALTHY LIFESTYLE
Bad eating habits, smoking, and not enough exercise can raise your cholesterol. We offer simple changes you can make to lower your risk and improve your heart health.

GO PREMIUM FOR MORE

* No Ads: Use the app without any interruptions.
* Better Calculators: Get detailed info for servings and meals.
* Advanced Tracking: More tools for tracking your blood pressure and weight.

READY TO IMPROVE YOUR HEALTH?
Download My Heartlet now and start controlling your cholesterol and blood pressure today. See what's really in your food and take steps to better health.
